sentences.en: Across the busy plaza, vendors sell hot dogs and croissant sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 在热闹广场的另一边，摊贩叫卖着热狗和羊角三明治。

sentences.en: As an ultimate sanction, they can sell their shares.
sentences.cn: 作为最高的处罚，他们可以出售他们的股份。

sentences.en: Don't sell your colleague short; she's a smart lawyer.
sentences.cn: 别低估你的同事；她可是个精明的律师

sentences.en: don't sell yourself short—you've got what it takes.
sentences.cn: 别低估了自己——你已经具备了成功的条件。

sentences.en: He must sell the house for the current market value.
sentences.cn: 他必须以目前的市价出售这座房子。

sentences.en: He regrets selling all his old records.
sentences.cn: 他后悔把所有的老唱片都卖掉了。

sentences.en: He sold out to the other side.
sentences.cn: 他出卖自己投靠到另一方去

sentences.en: I have set the wheels in motion to sell Endsleigh Court.
sentences.cn: 我已着手出售恩德斯勒公馆。

sentences.en: I hear she's going to sell out and move to the city.
sentences.cn: 我听说她打算变卖家当，搬到这座城市。

sentences.en: I think more customers probably prefer a soft sell.
sentences.cn: 我认为更多的顾客也许更喜欢软性推销。

sentences.en: I'll sell at a discount in return for a speedy sale.
sentences.cn: 为了尽快售出，我会打折销售。

sentences.en: If you offer him another hundred, I think he’ll sell.
sentences.cn: 如果你再加一百元钱，我想他会卖的。

sentences.en: Oil majors need not fear being unable to sell their crude.
sentences.cn: 大型石油公司无需担心原油销售不出去。

sentences.en: The landowners have had to sell their private aircraft.
sentences.cn: 这些土地所有者不得不卖掉自己的私人飞机。

sentences.en: The programme of sell-offs has been implemented by the new chief executive.
sentences.cn: 新任总裁已经执行了抛售方案。

sentences.en: The publisher expected the book to sell 1,500 copies, tops.
sentences.cn: 出版商预计该书至多能卖出1,500本。

sentences.en: The receivers are keen to sell the stores as one lot.
sentences.cn: 破产事务官想要将这些店铺打包整体出售。

sentences.en: They sell materials for DIY mosaics and ready-made panels.
sentences.cn: 他们出售自己动手做镶嵌画所需材料和现成的镶板。

sentences.en: They would sell the meat off as pet food.
sentences.cn: 他们将把肉当作宠物食品卖掉。

sentences.en: universities and polytechnics are selling their souls for commercial success.
sentences.cn: 大学和工科院校正在为获取商业利益而做昧良心的事情。

sentences.en: What's wrong with his wanting to sell his land and move on?
sentences.cn: 他想卖掉土地离开这里，这有什么错呢？

phrases.phrase: sell a bill of goods【非正式用语】
sell down the river【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 甩卖：卖掉，出售通常是降低出售
出卖灵魂；做昧良心的事
&I{【俚语】} 出卖：出卖了自己的理想或同事
低估，轻视：低估（某人或物的）真正价值，轻视

phrases.phrase: sell someone a bill of goods

phrases.tran_cn: 自我行销；把自己卖出去

trans.tran_en: to give something to someone in exchange for money
to give something to someone in exchange for money
to give something to someone in exchange for money

trans.tran_cn: 卖，售，使好卖，使接受，使赞成，销售
